title: One of a kind studio/loft condo with water views! NOVEMBER 1st
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 45147366', 'Rent: $2,000 / Month', 'Beds: 0', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 11/01/2022', 'Pet: No Pets', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Spacious studio overlooking the Boston skyline for rent!', 'This large apartment features exposed brick, open spaces, modern finishes and best of all beautiful views!', 'Laundry in unit is a great feature for this top floor apartment.', 'Loft-style area adds greater versatility for usage of space.', 'Apartment is ready for move-in asap, 1/2 month broker fee', 'FEATURES', 'Close to public transportation', 'Hardwood Floors', 'High Ceiling', 'High Ceilings', 'Loft', 'Modern Bath', 'Modern Kitchen', 'Patio or deck', 'Refrigerator', 'Roof Deck', 'Stainless Steel Appliance(s)', 'Stainless steel appliances', 'Stove', 'Updated/renovated kitchen', 'Shaun Ulloa', 'Sales broker', '(617) 359-0359', 'Foundation Real Estate Services']
